description: Jiguro is Balsa`s mentor, caretaker, and bodyguard. Originally the leader and strongest member of the king of Kanbal`s `Nine Spears`; he `betrayed` his country to save Balsa`s life. After fleeing Kanbal, they were pursued by the other eight `Spears`. In a series of pitched battles, Jiguro was forced to kill the men he considered his best friends. He also trained Balsa to wield a spear and she later `inherited` his spear after he passed away.
name: Jiguro Musa
